definition: abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]

sentences.english: After ten years of careful preparations, he attacked and finally conquered the State of Wu.
sentences.chinese: 经过十年艰苦奋斗，越过终于雪耻战胜吴国。

sentences.english: We should carry through the principle of plain living and hard struggle.
sentences.chinese: 艰苦奋斗的精神要贯彻始终。

sentences.english: Hard work is rewarding And three years later, we me again.
sentences.chinese: 艰苦奋斗是值得的，三年后我们又相遇了。

sentences.english: The spirit of arduous struggle is a social-historical category.
sentences.chinese: 艰苦奋斗精神是一个社会历史范畴。

sentences.english: We will strongly advocate hard work and plain living and firmly oppose extravagance and waste.
sentences.chinese: 大力提倡艰苦奋斗，坚决制止奢侈浪费。

sentences.english: They should do things simply and economically, practising economy and working hard with perseverance.
sentences.chinese: 要提倡因陋就简，经济节约，艰苦奋斗。

sentences.english: Hard  graft is the only way to succeed in business.
sentences.chinese: 艰苦奋斗是在事业上成功的唯一途径。

sentences.english: They must also take the lead in working hard and living simply.
sentences.chinese: 艰苦奋斗，也要高级干部带头。

sentences.english: We in China are proud of our achievements accomplished through strenuous efforts.
sentences.chinese: 中国对自己通过艰苦奋斗而取得的成就感到自豪。

sentences.english: Live plainly, struggle hard, do not wallow in luxuries and pleasures.
sentences.chinese: 以艰苦奋斗为荣，以娇奢淫逸为耻。

sentences.english: Hard work and discipline could lead to self-improvement.
sentences.chinese: 艰苦奋斗和严守纪律是改善自我的途径。

sentences.english: Work hard to succeed but not to the detriment of others.
sentences.chinese: 在不损害他人利益的前提下为成功艰苦奋斗。

sentences.english: Strive hardy for success without impairing other's benefit.
sentences.chinese: 在不损害他人利益的前提下为成功艰苦奋斗。

sentences.english: Working hard and frugal are both virtues.
sentences.chinese: 艰苦奋斗和勤俭节约均是美德。

sentences.english: " I "work hard, " 3 minutes and 6 issue still empty 3.
sentences.chinese: 我又“艰苦奋斗”了3分钟，六道题还空着三个。

sentences.english: We must continue to develop the revolutionary tradition of thrift and hard work.
sentences.chinese: 我们应继续发扬艰苦奋斗的革命传统。

definition: to work energetically for prosperity (of the country)
to keep on fighting in spite of all setbacks (idiom)/to be undaunted by repeated setbacks/to be indomitable
persisting despite trials and tribulations (idiom); conspicuous determination
the hardships of beginning an undertaking (idiom)
to dare to be first/to pioneer (idiom)
